We are collaborating with MIT's poverty action lab to examine how load balancing can be roll out in the Indian context.
Besides helping to make energy cleaner this could also help to make energy more reliable. Making energy supply more reliable could have a big impact on economic activitiy in a country like India and therefore help to address poverty as well.
